actionCalls.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_drip_email
actionCalls.label: Copy 1 of Copy 1 of drip email

decisions.name: Copy_1_of_move_to_work_hours
decisions.label: Copy 1 of move to work hours

formulas.name: movetoweekday
formulas.expression: IF( MOD(DATEVALUE({!$Record.Next_Drip__c} - 4/24) - DATE(1900, 1, 1), 7) = 5, 2, IF( MOD(DATEVALUE({!$Record.Next_Drip__c} - 4/24) - DATE(1900, 1, 1), 7) = 6, 1, 0 ) )

formulas.description: bump next date to work hours
formulas.name: Next_date_add_days

Flow.interviewLabel: Drip Builder with Booking Status Filter {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Drip Builder with Booking Status Filter

recordUpdates.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_bump_hours
recordUpdates.label: Copy 1 of Copy 1 of bump hours

recordUpdates.name: Copy_1_of_update_for_preview_test
recordUpdates.label: Copy 1 of update for preview test

recordUpdates.name: Copy_2_of_Copy_1_of_bump_hours
recordUpdates.label: Copy 2 of Copy 1 of bump hours

recordUpdates.name: stop_drip_due_to_booking_status
recordUpdates.label: stop drip due to booking status

start.filterFormula: AND( {!$Record.Campaign.IsActive}, ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Campaign.Type}, "Drip Email stopped by Booking Status"), OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Status}, "Drip queued"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Status}, "Drip Started"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Status}, "Drip queued (review)") ), NOT({!$Record.HasOptedOutOfEmail}), ISNULL({!$Record.Lead.EmailBouncedDate}), ISNULL({!$Record.Contact.EmailBouncedDate}), NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.Email})) )

textTemplates.name: otherdripsalert
textTemplates.text:
"{!$Record.Campaign.Name}" campaign/drip has been paused/not started for: {!$Record.FirstName} {!$Record.LastName} {!$Record.Email}

Other recent drips:

    {!conflicting_campaign_list}

Recent Emails:

    {!recent_emails}

Recent Tasks:

    {!recent_tasks}

Update Campaign Member Status from {!$Record.Status}:

  • Click to instantly change to "Drip Started" (to send emails)
  • Click to instantly change to "Drip Stopped"
